name: The Cursed Legacy
description:
The Cursed Legacy is a Horror Escape Game set in a dark and mysterious atmosphere. Keep calm and solve the riddles to unravel this strange disappearance. But be careful, you're not alone!

Investigate and Gather clues

Solve the riddles

Discover the story And... survive

The Developer

After battling evil entities on This is a Ghost, I wanted to focus on another project I'm passionate about: The Cursed Legacy. This game, with its original story, is the first chapter in a horrific experience rich in mystery, black powder and demonic creatures.

Nuci
